org.aion.api

Interface IUtils


  • public interface IUtils
    IUtils is an interface class that provides common utility methods.
    Author:
    Jay Tseng

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String bytes2Hex(byte[] bytes)
      It is a help function to convert a byte array to it's hex representation as string.
      static boolean endTxStatus(int status)
      Check the transaction hash is a valid length byte[].
      static byte[] hex2Bytes(java.lang.String hexstr)
      Returns the byte representation of a hex string, note that this function translates the hex into byte, not a direct getBytes() conversion.
      static byte[] sha3(byte[] in)
      Returns the bytes array represent the sha3 hashing result giving input

    • Method Detail

      • bytes2Hex

        static java.lang.String bytes2Hex(byte[] bytes)
        It is a help function to convert a byte array to it's hex representation as string. Returns hex string given a valid byte array.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the variable bytes array.
        Returns:
        the class String.

      • hex2Bytes

        static byte[] hex2Bytes(java.lang.String hexstr)
        Returns the byte representation of a hex string, note that this function translates the hex into byte, not a direct getBytes() conversion.
        Parameters:
        hexstr - the class String of the bytes.
        Returns:
        the variable bytes array represented of the hex string.

      • endTxStatus

        static boolean endTxStatus(int status)
        Check the transaction hash is a valid length byte[].
        Parameters:
        status - the int value represent the transaction status is the end status.
        Returns:
        the boolean value.

      • sha3

        static byte[] sha3(byte[] in)
        Returns the bytes array represent the sha3 hashing result giving input
        Parameters:
        in - the bytes array want to do sha3 hashing.
        Returns:
        the result of the bytes array after sha3.
